member.summary: Helps to save data about files in blob storage into cache.

member.summary: Removes all data from cache about given .
member.param: Representation of Azure blob unit. Is used as a key to cache values.

member.summary: Marks information about existence of blob in blob storage into cache.

True if blob exists in blob storage, false otherwise.

member.summary: Indicates if information about blob existence in blob storage is cached.

member.summary: Indicates if blob exists in blob storage, false otherwise.

member.returns: True if blob exists in blob storage. False if blob does not exist or the information about existence is not known.

member.name: T:CMS.AzureStorage.BlobMultiPartUploader
member.summary: Class for uploading large files to Azure blob storage.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.BlobMultiPartUploader.#ctor(CMS.AzureStorage.BlobInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates object for uploading large files in smaller parts to Azure blob storage.
member.param: Maximal size of the part sent in one request to Azure blob storage.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.BlobMultiPartUploader.InitMultiPartUpload
member.summary: Inits multipart upload to Azure blob storage.
member.returns: Upload ID, unique identifier for one multipart upload to Azure blob storage. Returned upload ID is needed for each subsequent multipart upload operation.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.BlobMultiPartUploader.MultiPartUploadFromStream(System.String,System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Uploads data inside a stream in multiple parts to Azure blob storage.
member.param: Unique identifier for one multipart upload. Can be obtained by method.
Number that defines position of the data obtained by the stream in the whole multipart upload process.
Stream with data to upload. Supplied stream has always it's position set to origin.
member.returns: Unique identifiers of the uploaded parts.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.BlobMultiPartUploader.CompleteMultiPartUploadProcess(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Completes multiple part upload process. Sends final request to Azure blob storage to merge all parts already sent.
member.param: Unique identifier for one multipart upload. Can be obtained by method.
Identifiers of the parts already sent to Azure blob storage, obtained by calling
member.returns: ETag of the uploaded file.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.BlobMultiPartUploader.AbortMultiPartUpload(System.String)
member.summary: Aborts multipart upload.
member.param: Unique identifier for one multipart upload. Can be obtained by method.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.BlobMultiPartUploader.GetBlockId(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates block id for given uploadSessionId and part number. For one blob all the block ids need to have the same length.
member.param: Unique identifier for one multipart upload. Can be obtained by method.
Number that defines position of the data obtained by the stream in the whole multipart upload process.
member.returns: A Base64-encoded string that identifies the block.

member.summary: Reads at most data from to .
member.param: Byte array to save data from .
Number of bytes to read from .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, which provides operations with directories.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.Directory.Exists(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the given path refers to an existing directory on disk.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.Directory.CreateDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Creates all directories and subdirectories as specified by path.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.Directory.EnumerateFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of file names that match a search pattern in a specified path.
member.param: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search. This string is not case-sensitive.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the files in the directory specified by and that match the specified search pattern.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.Directory.EnumerateFilesCore(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of file names that match a search pattern in a specified path.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.Directory.GetFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the names of files (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory.
member.param: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search. This string is not case-sensitive.
member.returns: An array of the full names (including paths) for the files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern, or an empty array if no files are found.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.Directory.EnumerateDirectories(System.String,System.String,CMS.IO.SearchOption)
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of directory names that match a search pattern in a specified path, and optionally searches subdirectories.
member.param: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search. This string is not case-sensitive.
One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or should include all subdirectories.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the directories in the directory specified by and that match the specified search pattern and option.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureStorage.Directory.GetDirectories(System.String,System.String,CMS.IO.SearchOption)
member.summary: Gets the names of the subdirectories (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the current directory, and optionally searches subdirectories.
member.param: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search. This string is not case-sensitive.
One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.
member.returns: An array of the full names (including paths) of the subdirectories that match the specified criteria, or an empty array if no directories are found.
